description.zh-cn: 美国一所公立研究型大学，始建于1885年，是美国大学协会、大学研究协会的成员之一。学校总部位于美国佐治亚州首府亚特兰大市，与东北部的麻省理工学院、西部的加州理工学院并称美国三大理工学院。
description.en: An American public research university founded in 1885, a member of the Association of American Universities and the Universities Research Association. Headquartered in Atlanta, the capital of the U.S. state of Georgia, it is often referred to as one of the three major institutes of technology in the United States, alongside MIT in the Northeast and Caltech in the West.

description.zh-cn: 美国佐治亚州首府及最大城市，佐治亚理工学院主校区所在地，也是1996年夏季奥林匹克运动会的举办地。
description.en: The capital and most populous city of the U.S. state of Georgia. It is the location of Georgia Institute of Technology's main campus and was the host city for the 1996 Summer Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 美国佐治亚州的公立大学系统，佐治亚理工学院是其成员之一。
description.en: The public university system of the U.S. state of Georgia, of which Georgia Institute of Technology is a member.

description.zh-cn: 美国大学体育竞技联盟，佐治亚理工学院是其成员学校之一。
description.en: An American collegiate athletic conference, of which Georgia Institute of Technology is a member school.

description.zh-cn: 由美国和加拿大顶尖研究型大学组成的协会。佐治亚理工学院于2010年获邀加入。
description.en: An association of leading research universities in the United States and Canada. Georgia Institute of Technology was invited to join in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 1996年在亚特兰大举办的夏季奥林匹克运动会。佐治亚理工学院为其建造了奥运村等设施，对赛事顺利召开起到重要作用。
description.en: The Summer Olympic Games held in Atlanta in 1996. Georgia Institute of Technology played a significant role in the successful hosting of the event by constructing facilities such as the Olympic Village.

description.zh-cn: 佐治亚理工学院前校长，在任内对学院结构进行了重组，并为确保1996年亚特兰大夏季奥运会顺利召开起到了重要作用。
description.en: A former president of Georgia Institute of Technology who reorganized the university's structure and played an important role in ensuring the successful hosting of the 1996 Atlanta Summer Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 佐治亚理工学院校友，曾任该校第一位以校友身份出任的校长，后任史密森尼学会秘书长。
description.en: An alumnus of Georgia Institute of Technology who became its first alumnus president, and later served as the Secretary of the Smithsonian Institution.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国华盛顿特区的一组博物馆和研究中心，由美国政府资助、管理。
description.en: A group of museums and research centers administered by the government of the United States, located in Washington, D.C.

description.zh-cn: 佐治亚理工学院第11任校长，前科罗拉多大学博尔德分校校长。
description.en: The 11th president of Georgia Institute of Technology, formerly the chancellor of the University of Colorado at Boulder.

description.zh-cn: 佐治亚理工学院校友，第39任美国总统，2002年诺贝尔和平奖得主。
description.en: An alumnus of Georgia Institute of Technology, the 39th President of the United States, and the 2002 Nobel Peace Prize laureate.

description.zh-cn: 佐治亚理工学院校友，因发明聚合酶链式反应（PCR）而获得1993年诺贝尔化学奖。
description.en: An alumnus of Georgia Institute of Technology who received the 1993 Nobel Prize in Chemistry for his invention of the polymerase chain reaction (PCR).

description.zh-cn: 一种分子生物学技术，用于放大特定的DNA片段。由佐治亚理工学院校友凯利·穆利斯发明。
description.en: A molecular biology technique used to amplify specific segments of DNA. It was invented by Georgia Tech alumnus Kary Mullis.

description.zh-cn: 佐治亚理工学院校友，曾任巴拿马副总统、第50任巴拿马总统。
description.en: An alumnus of Georgia Institute of Technology, who served as Vice President and the 50th President of Panama.

description.zh-cn: 佐治亚理工学院电子计算机工程硕士，米哈游公司创始人之一，现任董事长及总裁。
description.en: Holder of a Master's degree in Electrical and Computer Engineering from Georgia Institute of Technology, co-founder of miHoYo, and its current chairman and president.

description.zh-cn: 中国视频游戏开发与动画公司，由佐治亚理工学院校友刘伟等人共同创立。
description.en: A Chinese video game development and animation company, co-founded by Georgia Tech alumnus Liu Wei.

nodes.id: 天津大学佐治亚理工深圳学院

zh-cn: 天津大学佐治亚理工深圳学院
en: Georgia Tech Shenzhen Institute, Tianjin University

description.zh-cn: 由佐治亚理工学院与天津大学合作在中国深圳设立的学院。
description.en: An institute in Shenzhen, China, established in cooperation between Georgia Institute of Technology and Tianjin University.

description.zh-cn: 佐治亚理工学院是乔治亚大学系统的成员之一。
description.en: Georgia Institute of Technology is a member of the University System of Georgia.

description.zh-cn: 佐治亚理工学院是大西洋沿岸联盟的成员学校之一。
description.en: Georgia Institute of Technology is a member school of the Atlantic Coast Conference.

description.zh-cn: 2010年4月20日，佐治亚理工学院应邀加入美国大学协会。
description.en: On April 20, 2010, Georgia Institute of Technology was invited to join the Association of American Universities.

description.zh-cn: 佐治亚理工学院为1996年亚特兰大夏季奥运会建造了奥运村等设施，对赛事的顺利召开起到了重要作用。
description.en: Georgia Institute of Technology contributed significantly to the 1996 Atlanta Summer Olympics by constructing facilities such as the Olympic Village, playing an important role in the successful hosting of the event.

description.zh-cn: John Patrick Crecine曾担任佐治亚理工学院校长，并于1988年推出了重组大学的计划。
description.en: John Patrick Crecine served as the president of Georgia Institute of Technology and introduced a plan to reorganize the university in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 时任校长John Patrick Crecine为确保1996年亚特兰大夏季奥运会顺利召开起到了重要作用。
description.en: Then-president John Patrick Crecine played an important role in ensuring the successful hosting of the 1996 Atlanta Summer Olympics.

description.zh-cn: G. Wayne Clough是佐治亚理工学院的毕业校友。
description.en: G. Wayne Clough is an alumnus of Georgia Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 1994年，G. Wayne Clough成为第一位以毕业校友的身份担任佐治亚理工学院校长的个人。
description.en: In 1994, G. Wayne Clough became the first alumnus to serve as the president of Georgia Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: G. Wayne Clough于2008年7月1日就任史密森尼学会秘书长。
description.en: G. Wayne Clough took office as the Secretary of the Smithsonian Institution on July 1, 2008.

description.zh-cn: 2009年4月1日，G. P. "Bud" Peterson成为佐治亚理工学院第11任校长。
description.en: On April 1, 2009, G. P. "Bud" Peterson became the 11th president of Georgia Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 吉米·卡特是佐治亚理工学院1946届校友。
description.en: Jimmy Carter is an alumnus of Georgia Institute of Technology, class of 1946.

description.zh-cn: 凯利·穆利斯是佐治亚理工学院1964届校友。
description.en: Kary Mullis is an alumnus of Georgia Institute of Technology, class of 1964.

description.zh-cn: 凯利·穆利斯发明了聚合酶链式反应（PCR），并因此获得诺贝尔化学奖。
description.en: Kary Mullis invented the polymerase chain reaction (PCR), for which he was awarded the Nobel Prize in Chemistry.

description.zh-cn: 胡安·卡洛斯·瓦雷拉是佐治亚理工学院1985届校友。
description.en: Juan Carlos Varela is an alumnus of Georgia Institute of Technology, class of 1985.

degree.en: Master in Electrical and Computer Engineering

description.zh-cn: 刘伟毕业于佐治亚理工学院，获得电子计算机工程硕士学位。
description.en: Liu Wei graduated from Georgia Institute of Technology with a master's degree in Electrical and Computer Engineering.

description.zh-cn: 刘伟是米哈游公司的联合创始人之一。
description.en: Liu Wei is one of the co-founders of miHoYo.

relationships.target: 天津大学佐治亚理工深圳学院

description.zh-cn: 佐治亚理工学院与天津大学合作在深圳设立了天津大学佐治亚理工深圳学院。
description.en: Georgia Institute of Technology co-founded the Georgia Tech Shenzhen Institute, Tianjin University in Shenzhen in cooperation with Tianjin University.
